item.title: 2025 is best as a killer mech roguelike, it was a DLC for a game we all dismissed as a Bloodborne clone back in 2023
item.description:
2025 is best as a killer mech roguelike, it was a DLC for a game we all dismissed as a Bloodborne clone back in 2023

Lies of P: Overturn is a game no longer held down by its own strings.
